name: landing-call-status
description: Represents BACnet Landing Call Status, which contains information about a landing call in a lift (elevator) system, including the floor number, call direction or destination, and optional floor text.

fields.name: floor-number
fields.description: The floor number where the landing call was made.

fields.name: command

options.name: direction
options.description: The direction requested for the lift car (up or down).

options.name: destination
options.description: The destination floor number for the call.

fields.description: The call command, either a direction or a specific destination floor.

fields.name: floor-text
fields.description: Optional text description of the floor.
